title: mid-game crashes/freezes?
body:
new to LoL, this happened twice now. started the tutorial, and less than 5 minutes in everything freezes. the screen's frozen, i can't move my mouse, my keyboard is nullified. this happens again during my first online match with two friends. has this happened to anyone else?

(this also happened for me when i tried diablo 3)

replies.body: This freeze has been a recurring issue for some players after a Windows 10 update.  It auto enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing some freezing and fps problems.  Disabling it should fix this up!
